General.Name: Websol Energy System Limited
General.Description: Websol Energy System Limited manufactures and sells solar photovoltaic (PV) crystalline solar cells and related modules in India. It also exports its products to Germany, Italy, and the United States. The company was formerly known as Websol Energy Systems Ltd. and changed its name to Websol Energy System Limited in October 2011. Websol Energy System Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Falta, India.
General.Address: Falta Special Economic Zone, Falta, India, 743504

1.Name: Mr. Sumit Kumar Shaw
